tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished fourth at the British Columbia Qualifying Tournament, earning exempt status through the first six events...Started the Mackenzie Tour season with a T13 finish at the PC Financial Open...At the Bayview Place Island Savings Open, claimed a T15...Recorded his first top-five finish at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open...Finished T2 at The Great Waterway Classic to claim No. 19 on the Order of Merit, thus earning an exemption into the second stage of the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament.
tourBios.personal: Interned at IMG Worldwide...Favorite course he's played is Cypress Point...Course he'd most like to play is Augusta National...Favorite sports team is Manchester United...Twitter name is @charliebullgolf.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T2nd in 2015 at the The Great Waterway Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T56th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
